name: Build Android APK

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-android:
    runs-on: ubuntu-22.04
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Install system dependencies
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y \
            python3-pip \
            build-essential \
            git \
            zip \
            unzip \
            openjdk-17-jdk \
            autoconf \
            libtool \
            pkg-config \
            zlib1g-dev \
            libncurses5-dev \
            libncursesw5-dev \
            libtinfo5 \
            cmake \
            libffi-dev \
            libssl-dev \
            automake \
            gettext \
            libltdl-dev

      - name: Install Buildozer
        run: |
          pip install --upgrade pip wheel setuptools
          pip install buildozer cython==0.29.36
          pip install kivy

      - name: Build APK
        run: |
          yes | buildozer android debug 2>&1 | tee build.log || true
          
      - name: Check build output
        run: |
          ls -la bin/ || echo "bin directory not found"
          find . -name "*.apk" 2>/dev/null || echo "No APK found"

      - name: Upload APK artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        if: always()
        with:
          name: calculator-apk
          path: |
            bin/*.apk
            build.log
          retention-days: 30
          if-no-files-found: warn
